Subskills.name: Bigger Outlet
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of charged bolts.

Subskills.name: Electric Vains
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by charged bolts.

Subskills.name: Electric Field
Subskills.description: Unleash charged bolts in a circle around you causing them to return after a short duration.

Subskills.name: Flash Bolt
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of charged bolts.

Subskills.name: Halting Storm
Subskills.description: Chance to deal increased damage slowing targets on hit.

Subskills.name: Weakening Charge
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict lightning break on hit.

Subskills.name: Efficient Wiring
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana cost of charged bolts.

Subskills.name: Non-conductive Boots
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using charged bolts.

Subskills.name: Railgun
Subskills.description: Unleash charged bolts as a barrage dealing increased damage. Charged bolts now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Static Buildup
Subskills.description: Increases the size of charged bolts.

Subskills.name: Additive Voltage
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to increase the amount of charged bolts.

Subskills.name: Electrocharged Therapy
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict stasis on hit.

Subskills.name: World Ender
Subskills.description: Conjure a single large charged bolt scaling from projectile amount and unleashing charged bolts into all directions after exploding.

Subskills.name: Loaded Thunder
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash a large pulsating thunder bolt on hit dealing increased damage.
